name: Fight City
description:
Welcome to Fight City. 
The people here only know one thing - you can't just fight to live, you have to live to fight.

Control The Fighter in this brawling, martial-arts-inspired grungey fightpunk micro-roguelike. Explore each of the three districts and beat down everyone that stands in your way as you seek to build a new life after crawling from The Muckpits of Sewer City. 

Confused? Well don't be. 
Check your lease, pal. You're living in Fight City. 

Controls
 Use WASD or HJKL to move in the Cardinal Directions.  Use QEZX or YUBN to move Diagonally.  Press G to pick up Weapons or Technique scrolls on The Fighter's space. Press Spacebar to wait one turn without acting.

Use your mouse to click and on the weapon and technique icons in the HUD to display their stats and descriptions.

How to Play
Fight City is a roguelike featuring  turn and grid-based gameplay. 
You start with nothing but the fists on your arms but can acquire a variety of Weapons and scrappy Techniques on your journey. 

Each Weapon brings with it different stats and trade-offs, and Techniques modify your abilities further. 

Attack opponents automatically by trying to move into the grid space they occupy. Attacking diagonally always uses your equipped Weapon. Attacking on cardinal directions uses your Weapon by default, but learning Techniques will replace these basic attacks.

Techniques are acquired by picking up scrolls. Techniques modify the stats of your weapon and can even introduce new abilities.

Combine various Techniques and Weapons to unleash devastating combinations on your opponents!

Find the Fight City Taxicab to escape to the next district.
